title: Midterm Elections: House Races to Watch
description: Few prognostications give Democrats a chance to hold onto their narrow margin in the House, and Republicans hope to make gains in traditionally bedrock blue states.
dc:creator: Jonathan Weisman

media:content.media:credit: Kristen Zeis for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Representative Elaine Luria, center, spoke with voters in Virginia Beach last month.
